basics.name: Zhuoyan (Skylar) Li
basics.label: Current affiliation: Computational Biologist at NYGC

education.institution: Columbia University in the City of New York

work.name: New York Genome Center, Satija Lab
work.summary: Developing and maintaining Seurat for single-cell analysis, including functionality for high-resolution whole transcriptome spatial data and integrating machine learning for rapid cell type annotation.

work.name: Columbia University, Synthetic Biological Systems Lab
work.summary: Investigated engineered bacterial swarming patterns and developed Transcrobial, a GAN for generating macroscopic bacterial images with under 200 samples.

work.name: AllianceBernstein
work.position: U.S. Medical Devices Summer Research Associate
work.summary: Produced a competitive analysis of orthopedic suppliers and developed a web-scraping tool to quantify med-tech corporate management capabilities.

work.name: Sony Interactive Entertainment
work.summary: Led front-end development of PlayStation Network features, optimized API latency by 25%, and built a UI component library with Storybook.

work.name: Procter & Gamble
work.summary: Developed quantitative methods to compare fabric care products and led improvements to internal image analysis methods.

work.name: University of Tokyo Edge Capital
work.summary: Analyzed data on private biotech companies and performed due diligence for biotech investments.

awards.title: Ezoe Memorial Recruit Foundation Student Scholar
awards.summary: Selected to receive full funding for graduate school tuition and living expenses.

awards.title: Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia - Social Impact
awards.summary: Awarded for nonprofit work as co-founder of atelier basi, an educational organization providing free college admission support to Japanese high school students from underrepresented areas.

awards.title: BME 2023 Senior Design Award, Runner Up
awards.summary: Developed an OPEP device to provide personalized therapy for patients with pulmonary diseases.

awards.title: CSC/IMATS Art + Science Competition Finalist
